targets.query: SELECT max("active_code") FROM "systemd_units" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hosts$/ AND "name" = 'nginx.service') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT max("active_code") FROM "systemd_units" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hosts$/ AND "name" = 'consul.service') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT max("active_code") FROM "systemd_units" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hosts$/ AND "name" = 'consul-template.service') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT count("request") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "resp_code" = '200') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_user") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = '${hosts}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_system") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hosts$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_system") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hosts$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("resp_bytes") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "resp_code" =~ /^1/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT max("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" = '${hosts}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hosts$/ AND "path" = '/dbagiga') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "path" fill(null)
SELECT first("request_time") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hosts$/ AND "resp_code" =~ /^3/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT first("request_time") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hosts$/ AND "resp_code" =~ /^4/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT first("request_time") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hosts$/ AND "resp_code" =~ /^5/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("resp_bytes") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "resp_code" =~ /^2/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT count("request") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hosts$/ AND "resp_code" = '400') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT count("request") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hosts$/ AND "resp_code" = '401') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT count("request") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hosts$/ AND "resp_code" = '403') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT count("request") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hosts$/ AND "resp_code" = '404') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT count("request") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hosts$/ AND "resp_code" = '500') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("resp_bytes") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "resp_code" fill(null) SLIMIT 10
SELECT mean("resp_bytes") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "resp_code" =~ /^1/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("resp_bytes") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "resp_code" fill(null) SLIMIT 10
SELECT mean("resp_bytes") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "resp_code" fill(null) SLIMIT 10
SELECT mean("resp_bytes") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "resp_code" fill(null) SLIMIT 10
SELECT mean("resp_bytes") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "resp_code" fill(null) SLIMIT 10

list.name: hosts
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY=host where nb_role != null
